channel.title: retweet_thursday on Gabe Kangas
channel.description: Recent content in retweet_thursday on Gabe Kangas

item.title: My interview about Retweet Thursday
item.description: Well who would have thought? The fine people over at Silicon Prairie News were interested in talking to me about the weirdest meme to ever hit Twitter (aside from #MufasaMonday I suppose), #retweet_thursday. They told me they weren't sure who was behind it at first, but figured out it was out of Omaha somewhere, so they pinpointed it to me. I never really made it public that the bot was run by me, but I wasn't really hiding the fact either :)
